items.name: FAIR-F1
items.label: FAIR F1
items.description: (meta)data are assigned a globally unique and persistent identifier

items.name: FAIR-F2
items.label: FAIR F2
items.description: data are described with rich metadata

items.name: FAIR-F3
items.label: FAIR F3
items.description: metadata clearly and explicitly include the identifier of the data it describes

items.name: FAIR-F4
items.label: FAIR F4
items.description: (meta)data are registered or indexed in a searchable resource

items.name: FAIR-A1
items.label: FAIR A1
items.description: (meta)data are retrievable by their identifier using a standardized communications protocol

items.name: FAIR-A1.1
items.label: FAIR A1.1
items.description: the standardized communications protocol is open, free, and universally implementable

items.name: FAIR-A1.2
items.label: FAIR A1.2
items.description: the standardized communications protocol allows for an authentication and authorization procedure, where necessary

items.name: FAIR-A2
items.label: FAIR A2
items.description: metadata are accessible, even when the data are no longer available

items.name: FAIR-I1
items.label: FAIR I1
items.description: (meta)data use a formal, accessible, shared, and broadly applicable language for knowledge representation

items.name: FAIR-I2
items.label: FAIR I2
items.description: (meta)data use vocabularies that follow FAIR principles

items.name: FAIR-R1
items.label: FAIR R1
items.description: meta(data) are richly described with a plurality of accurate and relevant attributes

items.name: FAIR-R1.1
items.label: FAIR R1.1
items.description: (meta)data are released with a clear and accessible data usage license
